frame.name: Emotion_active
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame has similarities to Experiencer_subject, but here the verbs are more 'active' in meaning. (For example, they often occur in negative imperatives, e.g. "Don't worry!''). They also differ from Experiencer_subject verbs in that they occur with <fen>Topic</fen> expressions and can be used in the present progressive: <ex>Pat is still <t>worrying</t> <fex name="Topic">about the exam</fex>.</ex> <ment>*Pat is fearing the exam.</ment> This frame can be thought of as a blend of a basic emotion frame with Cogitation. </def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Experiencer</fen> indicates the one who is actively expressing emotion over the <fen>Topic</fen>. It usually occurs as the subject of the verb.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">Kim</fex> <t>worried</t> about the phone bill.</ex> <ex>He <t>worries</t> a great deal about the house.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Experiencer's emotion generally is about something. This is indicated with a <fen>Topic</fen> which usually occurs in a PP-Complement.
<ex>Kim <t>fretted</t> <fex name="Top">over the exam</fex>.</ex> <ex>He <t>worries</t> a great deal <fex name="Top">about the house</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Degree</fen> indicates the degree to which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> expresses the emotion.
<ex>He <t>worries</t> <fex name="Degr">a great deal</fex> about the house.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Manner</fen> indicates the manner in which the active emotion is expressed.
<ex>I <t>fretted</t> <fex name="Manr">endlessly</fex> about the work that was needed to co-ordinate it all.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Result</fen> indicates what happens due to the <fen>Experiencer</fen> actively expressing emotion.
<ex>She was <t>worrying</t> herself <fex name="Result">sick</fex> about Biggles.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action performed by the <fen>Experiencer</fen> which brings about the active emotion.
<ex>Although she tried to distract me over that week, I still worried about them <fex name="mea">by noticing all the little things that they left behind</fex> .</ex></def-root>
